Title: At War
Writer: Ralph Blindauer (collaboration), Stéphane Brizé (screenplay), Olivier Gorce (screenplay), Olivier Lemaire (collaboration), Xavier Mathieu (collaboration)
Actors: Vincent Lindon, Mélanie Rover, Jacques Borderie, David Rey
Plot: After promising 1100 employees that they would protect their jobs, the managers of a factory decide to suddenly close up shop. Laurent takes the lead in a fight against this decision.
